Functions for interfacing with the IO Slave module. More...

Detailed Description

Functions for interfacing with the IO Slave module.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"

I/O Slave fifo max size

Macro definitions for I/O slave (IOS) FIFO max size.

These macros may be used with any of the HAL APIs
